did.abstract: Photocopies of letters to Alfred and his wife, of Sugar Grove (Watauga Co.), N.C., from son G. F. Adams, and from B. C. McBride, both members of the 1st North Carolina Cavalry, C.S.A., stationed near Richmond, Va. Topics include McBride's recovery from a head wound in Winder Hospital, scouting on the Potomac, camp life, and the scarcity of food and clothing.
